page.title: 10Housing at Brightwalton
page.content: {Brightwalton Village}has{47}dwellings, The{Green 20, Southend 7, Pudding Lane {8}and{Brightwalton Holt 6,}and 11 others are more scattered.51 of these dwellings are detached houses{and}26 semi-detached,{21 are detached {bungalows}and{there is 1 flat.67}are owner{occupied,14 council rented, 10 {private rental}and 8 tied houses.95 of these are{people's main}home.Only 4 are second homes. There are many old houses in the area. 34 were built before 1800 and 15 during the 19th century.Between 1901 and 1950 19 houses were built.Since then 31 houses have been built.About half the houses have 3 bedrooms.There are a few houses with 5 or 6 bedrooms. There seems to be no desire to expand housing or for units for light industry and so the village seems to be diminishing.
